tagline: Full-stack generalist who builds complete systems and knows when to call in a specialist
pros: Builds working prototypes across the entire stack quickly
Sees cross-layer integration issues that specialists miss
Adapts to unfamiliar domains and technologies rapidly
Pragmatic technology choices that optimize for shipping
cons: Lacks deep expertise in any single domain
Components may need specialist rework for production quality
Breadth-first approach can produce 'good enough' code that accumulates tech debt

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
